title: Small sea shore
review: We visited Acquarium on visit to Mussorie. It is located on Mall road near to ropeway. You can reach acqarium by escalator from starting entry point. There are so many different types of fish which we can see.

title: Also has restaurant inside
review: good collection of fishes but varieties are less. Visit Dehradun zoo it has good variety of fishes is aquarium

title: Conveniently located in the Mall road, Mussoorie.
review: The Jawahar Aquariums is conveniently located in the Mall road, Mussoorie. various species of colorful  fishes are displayed both of sweet water and salt water kind. Staff are good and will explain the details of fishes. There is an escalator to reach the entry gate from ground level.

title: Reasonably well though not very large
review: It was a good small aquarium. The entry ticket was Rs 35/person. Photography was not allowed. The fishes were exotic and were well presented. It should not take more than 20 minutes to visit this place and the place is close to ropeway to gunhill.

title: Waste of time
review: there is nothing to see.. on one floor there are about 10-12 big & small aquariums... on the other floor there are only two wooden structures with aquariums fitted in them... some are empty.. a few broken...

title: Good Small aquirium
review: Entry Fees 25/-. Goods small aquarium with few variety of fishes. especially crocodile fish is amazing. Can go with kids

title: My Mussoorie memories
review: This aquarium is not that huge but maintaining rare and beautiful species of Pisces (Zoological term for fishes) like famous and most dangerous Phirana and most expensive lucky fish which cost above Rs. 5 lakhs. Here one can find a tree made an integral part of aquarium building without chopping it right from roots to top portion through concrete ceiling of first floor is really nice to see by saving a tree and continuing it in as is condition.

title: Good small aquarium
review: This is good small aquarium in Mall road. There are some beautiful and rare species of fish. There is sagar rathna also for fooding.

title: Not a great place
review: It is very ordinary place. Unless you want to visit an acquarium with young ones, you better avoid this place.

title: Small museum ...not so good in terms of ticket charges
review: Its a very small museum u can find some unique species of fishes but there are only few so don't expect much.. good to visit along with kids. there is a entry fee u need to pay .

title: Aquarium on mall road
review: Nice place for fish lovers .it's waste of time and money for others .it's a small place on mall road. The entry fee is rs 35 per person. And Rs. 30 extra if you want to click photos.
